issue.title: [C++] Update crc32c dependency to 1.1.2
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14232](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14232). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
To support GCS I introduced a dependency on crc32c. The latest release (1.1.2), created earlier today, should fix the build problems with ARM64.
